0.1: Because of the drought many people repented and improved their ways. additionally, there were 7 thousand people in Israel who did not bow down to Baal.

29.0: And he healed By way of borrowing [from its original meaning], it used the term, healing, [to mean] building a destroyed building. And likewise (Nehemiah 4:1), "that healing had come to the walls of Jerusalem"; and likewise (I Chronicles 11:8), "and Yoav resuscitated the rest of the city."
